what: Generates ecological metrics from drone imagery for infectious disease modeling
title: Generates ecological metrics from drone imagery for infectious disease modeling
text: provide R users new way obtain ecological metrics related infectious diseases processing orthomosaics derived RGB, multispectral, lidar, thermal multispectral drones.

text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
